CB8F03554A8FBE4AA6CC0D00F0C9C26A.name: MK1 Drill Suit
CB8F03554A8FBE4AA6CC0D00F0C9C26A.desc: The baseline suit of any Driller. A true classic, and a mainstay of DRG since the inception.

DF35DAFC2CBDD84580C84B35248BC5AF.name: MK2 Drill Suit
DF35DAFC2CBDD84580C84B35248BC5AF.desc: A sleek, modern design, incorporating many snazzy innovations according to the lads down in R&D. They're not saying what exactly, though.

7C34048CE0E76346910AF701C9FCE639.name: MK3 Drill Suit
7C34048CE0E76346910AF701C9FCE639.desc: The no-frills version of the advanced MK3 line of armor. Cheap and light (comparatively speaking), this comfortable suit will provide a Driller with all the protection he needs for most operations. Or so the blurb on the box says, anyway...

3BDEA112F8C2204087722AD05CEBB1F3.name: MK4 Drill Suit
3BDEA112F8C2204087722AD05CEBB1F3.desc: Among the densest suits available in the DRG arsenal, the MK4 heavy Driller Suit leaves no question as to what you're here for. This suit will withstand a thermonuclear blast, though it HAS been said to be slightly susceptible to liquids. Just bear that in mind.

4A58EC12F780644C89EFAD844FE98E85.name: MK5 Drill Suit
4A58EC12F780644C89EFAD844FE98E85.desc: Another breakthrough from R&D. The MK5 Drill Suit is a masterpiece of engineering - the comfort of a leather armchair, wrapped in a titanium-alloy exoskeleton.

691C6A9D33B03D4BBB89C501E9857017.name: MK1 Engineer Suit
691C6A9D33B03D4BBB89C501E9857017.desc: The baseline suit of any Engineer. A true classic, and a mainstay of DRG since the inception.

54BCA9013BA30C408F5F73020857D1FF.name: MK2 Engineer Suit
54BCA9013BA30C408F5F73020857D1FF.desc: A sleek, modern design, incorporating many snazzy innovations according to the lads down in R&D. They're not saying what exactly, though.

2E441C2AA8A1A64A95B52191A5FDD215.name: MK3 Engineer Suit
2E441C2AA8A1A64A95B52191A5FDD215.desc: The MK3 line of mining gear is top of the line, and even this cut-down version offers several improvements over previous suits. It features heavy-duty powercells built straight into the plating, as well as handy pockets for snacks - not to mention an FM-radio in the collar.

34FC75960F4F7244A0A1C37E54926893.name: MK4 Engineer Suit
34FC75960F4F7244A0A1C37E54926893.desc: A walking command center, the MK4 heavy Engineer Suit means you'll never lose reception again. It's loaded up with so much top-of-the-line tech most of the eggheads can't even name it all.

EEA60DFA8224F740AEF8A80E1F5DD9C4.name: MK5 Engineer Suit
EEA60DFA8224F740AEF8A80E1F5DD9C4.desc: Also known as the "The Pincushion", the MK5 Engineer Suit is another technological marvel. It has more glowy and blinky bits than any other Engineer suit currently out there, and that's gotta be good.

EC88C4D809DD0E4D85EDF8C632CAB51C.name: MK1 Gunner Suit
EC88C4D809DD0E4D85EDF8C632CAB51C.desc: The baseline suit of any Gunner. A true classic, and a mainstay of DRG since the inception.

1E419F741DA2754993B99649E2D6C868.name: MK2 Gunner Suit
1E419F741DA2754993B99649E2D6C868.desc: A sleek, modern design, incorporating many snazzy innovations according to the lads down in R&D. They're not saying what exactly, though.

A1D7C5E5CA296E4A81C4FDBEA1226EA8.name: MK3 Gunner Suit
A1D7C5E5CA296E4A81C4FDBEA1226EA8.desc: The Gunner-version of the MK3 suit incorporates several breakthrough technologies straight off the lines at R&D. Ablative kevlar-plating, zero-friction joints, the list goes on and the eggheads are frankly pretty proud of this one.

C810882939CF7149B86C1505B3B90DD7.name: MK4 Gunner Suit
C810882939CF7149B86C1505B3B90DD7.desc: "And I heard a voice in the midst of the four beasts. And I looked, and behold a pale horse. And his name that sat on him was death, and hell followed with him."

E4DE0716E323FA41A5AFF226D806EDE2.name: MK5 Gunner Suit
E4DE0716E323FA41A5AFF226D806EDE2.desc: The MK5 Gunner Suit bears several similarities to old-world tortoises, which is completely fitting. It is a suit for the discerning gunner, offering both protection, mobility, and handy guard rails for lesser dwarves to shiveringly cling on to while you lay down the law.

A8EAC92C72A84048AF4048EB1F63494D.name: MK1 Scout Suit
A8EAC92C72A84048AF4048EB1F63494D.desc: The baseline suit of any Scout. A true classic, and a mainstay of DRG since the inception.

46A93FC8BA8F634597C9F83912566AD3.name: MK2 Scout Suit
46A93FC8BA8F634597C9F83912566AD3.desc: A sleek, modern design, incorporating many snazzy innovations according to the lads down in R&D. They're not saying what exactly, though.

30C4AFD7E386CB4891E21FA5164BC165.name: MK3 Scout Suit
30C4AFD7E386CB4891E21FA5164BC165.desc: Offering more armor at a significantly reduced weight while maintaining flexibility, this suit is superior to its predecessors in almost every single way. Plus, we've been told it looks swish as hell.

BE2E6656D5AF554F949816AAF21D4B5B.name: MK4 Scout Suit
BE2E6656D5AF554F949816AAF21D4B5B.desc: The Scout class isn't known for their heavy gear. But sometimes you do wanna dress for the job - especially if the job is facing down three 2-ton Dreadnoughts at close range. Stay safe.

B3F0D548AA88C34E9F484FE185075A4C.name: MK5 Scout Suit
B3F0D548AA88C34E9F484FE185075A4C.desc: An old-world adage says to "Be Prepared" - and the MK5 Scout Suit does not disappoint. Kevlar-reinforced vest and harness, steel-clawed boots, handy flare-pockets - they even included an extra sandwich pouch!

CD98E28914D16742A5564668CF10021E.name: Mighty Pelt - Gilded
CD98E28914D16742A5564668CF10021E.desc: An impressive beard for an impressive dwarf.

DFBE35D9F9824C408D668976A4A661C7.name: Mighty Pelt
DFBE35D9F9824C408D668976A4A661C7.desc: An impressive beard for an impressive dwarf.

3BDDB674C3DF7F4E9CD1B7D003D20D04.name: Mighty Pelt - Armored
3BDDB674C3DF7F4E9CD1B7D003D20D04.desc: An impressive beard for an impressive dwarf.

AFB031BEBA1B6B488E83FEEF782F8E4F.name: Monumental Goatee
AFB031BEBA1B6B488E83FEEF782F8E4F.desc: A favorite of dwarves and mountain people alike.

A7E3FF826A8AE04EAA10745A59A828D3.name: Monumental Goatee - Armored
A7E3FF826A8AE04EAA10745A59A828D3.desc: A favorite of dwarves and mountain people alike.

7B16C9555B75B2439E3A3513D14DCC62.name: Monumental Goatee - Gilded
7B16C9555B75B2439E3A3513D14DCC62.desc: A favorite of dwarves and mountain people alike.

35DF374A4626E64EBA62F2DD9BC2385A.name: Rambunctious Elder
35DF374A4626E64EBA62F2DD9BC2385A.desc: Impressive length and assertive messiness - this is a beard that commands respect.

703E0DF32EA7BD4BB3B11A06FE94B7BD.name: Twinned Wintry
703E0DF32EA7BD4BB3B11A06FE94B7BD.desc: A sombre and inspiring look for the fancy dwarf on the go.

67938C1DC01658419C36982EBE4743B6.name: Twinned Wintry - Armored
67938C1DC01658419C36982EBE4743B6.desc: A sombre and inspiring look for the fancy dwarf on the go.

0893B1F939A03E469F3217C2A3258C98.name: Twinned Wintry - Gilded
0893B1F939A03E469F3217C2A3258C98.desc: A sombre and inspiring look for the fancy dwarf on the go.

E03A35F4A4BBDD4DA818994CFB344735.name: Crested Waterfall
E03A35F4A4BBDD4DA818994CFB344735.desc: A mighty beard, armored for the mighty warrior.

AEF7A9BC3DABC249AA4F24266BD7B0F2.name: Tank Division
AEF7A9BC3DABC249AA4F24266BD7B0F2.desc: How do you carry a glorious beard into a fiery hellscape, without having to stick it underneath your armor? Simple!

779D1F2184A60D47B16CB77728D7F698.name: Bulbous Upturn
779D1F2184A60D47B16CB77728D7F698.desc: A merry beard for merry dwarves!

0FF70F3615879541AFFD8FBB0A781436.name: Hardworn Scraggler
0FF70F3615879541AFFD8FBB0A781436.desc: Wild growth, the smell of chewing tobacco, and the sound of heavy machinery in the background. This is a beard for the working dwarf.

00882DB60CF8454BBAB3DD07F5D25F6D.name: Tremendous Wave
00882DB60CF8454BBAB3DD07F5D25F6D.desc: No need for jewelry or other embellishments on this simply glorious beard. Just look at it!

F11A46772F449E41B64C2928C5B31236.name: Great Fork - Armored
F11A46772F449E41B64C2928C5B31236.desc: Why settle for ONE beard when you can have TWO?

4700BA086A0FB149BC1AEA9585B585E4.name: Great Fork
4700BA086A0FB149BC1AEA9585B585E4.desc: Why settle for ONE beard when you can have TWO?

82CB30ABD9CEC74193660F98A4BF4654.name: Great Fork - Gilded
82CB30ABD9CEC74193660F98A4BF4654.desc: Why settle for ONE beard when you can have TWO?

796C0B8C2882FC4797992B92CA4CE7D9.name: Double Horsetails
796C0B8C2882FC4797992B92CA4CE7D9.desc: For the up-and-coming dwarf, this is a most powerful look.

11A02805529EC74E8D24DE9FDE3E12E4.name: Double Horsetails - Armored
11A02805529EC74E8D24DE9FDE3E12E4.desc: For the up-and-coming dwarf, this is a most powerful look.

5084DB00951DDE44A1CA408B40FA3ED1.name: Double Horsetails - Gilded
5084DB00951DDE44A1CA408B40FA3ED1.desc: For the up-and-coming dwarf, this is a most powerful look.

1EBFE7D42C2BF540A4C473A59F7EFFC9.name: Braided Abundance
1EBFE7D42C2BF540A4C473A59F7EFFC9.desc: Just spectacular. For the elder dwarf, proud of his heritage, stoic in his beliefs. Does imply a certain level of vanity...

025DA252D10DE942B35904A88D73F4A8.name: Braided Abundance - Armored
025DA252D10DE942B35904A88D73F4A8.desc: Just spectacular. For the elder dwarf, proud of his heritage, stoic in his beliefs. Does imply a certain level of vanity...

5B186AFF4E74BE4193E7C8F5422DFD67.name: Braided Abundance - Gilded
5B186AFF4E74BE4193E7C8F5422DFD67.desc: Just spectacular. For the elder dwarf, proud of his heritage, stoic in his beliefs. Does imply a certain level of vanity...

261CC3A2CED27845BB3C9DA1292BB758.name: Savage Full
261CC3A2CED27845BB3C9DA1292BB758.desc: For a long time, the heritage of the savage hill-dwarves has been a topic of hushed conversation. Now...they are back!

A7EE9F2F31B0E74E86D546338AC016E0.name: Savage Full - Armored
A7EE9F2F31B0E74E86D546338AC016E0.desc: For a long time, the heritage of the savage hill-dwarves has been a topic of hushed conversation. Now...they are back!

1E5AC6A94A2ABF488552F93035200C86.name: Savage Full - Gilded
1E5AC6A94A2ABF488552F93035200C86.desc: For a long time, the heritage of the savage hill-dwarves has been a topic of hushed conversation. Now...they are back!

540F1190E062F146900445DB85F95348.name: Bulbous Full
540F1190E062F146900445DB85F95348.desc: For sheer volume, this one is hard to beat.

A479CBAAAA10A842A07E5CB8820EAB63.name: Massive Braid
A479CBAAAA10A842A07E5CB8820EAB63.desc: So you've grown your beard to an impressive length, but prefer not to get it caught in every piece of machinery. Braids is your answer - or, in this case, one braid to rule them all!

2712FF6C88B51E40A62F506CDF2272D9.name: Massive Braid - Armored
2712FF6C88B51E40A62F506CDF2272D9.desc: So you've grown your beard to an impressive length, but prefer not to get it caught in every piece of machinery. Braids is your answer - or, in this case, one braid to rule them all!

E87122087C67AD47B68F86E58EDD13DC.name: Massive Braid - Gilded
E87122087C67AD47B68F86E58EDD13DC.desc: So you've grown your beard to an impressive length, but prefer not to get it caught in every piece of machinery. Braids is your answer - or, in this case, one braid to rule them all!

1473968C92BF514FAAA6CC28F6850AC0.name: Bound Unicord
1473968C92BF514FAAA6CC28F6850AC0.desc: You want a big beard, but you also want it to be less obstructive? Bind it!

9721B0FDF03222438AF6991FA771718F.name: Bound Unicord - Armored
9721B0FDF03222438AF6991FA771718F.desc: You want a big beard, but you also want it to be less obstructive? Bind it - with shackles!

A62E6779884C3947B5BC42266CB4C4B4.name: Bound Unicord - Gilded
A62E6779884C3947B5BC42266CB4C4B4.desc: You want a big beard, but you also want it to be less obstructive? Bind it - with bling!

94EACBDE315E9147961BCE51A35DC702.name: Triple Trouble
94EACBDE315E9147961BCE51A35DC702.desc: An ancient standard that never goes out of style.

DCDDB81EF75A6C45927FD2DD76B04EF1.name: Triple Trouble - Armored
DCDDB81EF75A6C45927FD2DD76B04EF1.desc: An ancient standard that never goes out of style.

60338E2F6A8F7145A7907D5C8E887C8C.name: Triple Trouble - Gilded
60338E2F6A8F7145A7907D5C8E887C8C.desc: An ancient standard that never goes out of style.

EBC1936A89211940BFAFDECFF8F1F169.name: Dignified Elder
EBC1936A89211940BFAFDECFF8F1F169.desc: It takes a lot of effort to look this good.

B8B188A9AECA874D81A4F5AE9112ABD9.name: Pointed Goatee
B8B188A9AECA874D81A4F5AE9112ABD9.desc: As made famous by men in top hats or wearing horns.

CEBEB92475D13543AC254B031E17201E.name: Prospector
CEBEB92475D13543AC254B031E17201E.desc: 2 starlings and a surly crow nest in there.

BC0DAEBBDBFED84AB76FBD7FF0FA1067.name: Square
BC0DAEBBDBFED84AB76FBD7FF0FA1067.desc: Carved with a chisel rather than a razor.

1EF9B9FF8D3975468B4A9132B70E54D5.name: Voluminous Philosopher
1EF9B9FF8D3975468B4A9132B70E54D5.desc: Perfect for naps in the shade.

62C6378D758F784FA8AD0065A14AA8E2.name: Worrywart
62C6378D758F784FA8AD0065A14AA8E2.desc: Don't worry, young man. Be happy.

8196C91C79967F41ADB53CC42713BA08.name: Fuzzy Slugs
8196C91C79967F41ADB53CC42713BA08.desc: Thick and imposing, just like mama.

BE6E3ED4FD68EB4BB5549DBF87B7EF3E.name: Fuzzy Slugs
BE6E3ED4FD68EB4BB5549DBF87B7EF3E.desc: Thick and imposing, just like mama.

51F928245C91704298AAE2AF154FD59D.name: Merry Curvy
51F928245C91704298AAE2AF154FD59D.desc: For those with a cheery disposition.

299B8E34F47775478DFAA0941671BB1E.name: Monstrous Thick
299B8E34F47775478DFAA0941671BB1E.desc: Like two secondary beards for your eyes.

35C494A1BB07FD4B82A6B957D645D13A.name: Refined
35C494A1BB07FD4B82A6B957D645D13A.desc: Thin, refined, not elven at all.

7F1E56E42058E3449ECBEC83B4A2B741.name: Amethyst
7F1E56E42058E3449ECBEC83B4A2B741.desc: An unusual choice, but definitely eyecatching!

27B3B71914B56B4E9CC8C78A9E893302.name: Ancient
27B3B71914B56B4E9CC8C78A9E893302.desc: You're up there. Among the few. Those that lived.

5D6E7BBB6D96D64985EB3C24DB59F5AD.name: Black
5D6E7BBB6D96D64985EB3C24DB59F5AD.desc: Slick and dark like crude oil.

64A38893B90F2A468411F575136319E4.name: Black
64A38893B90F2A468411F575136319E4.desc: Slick and dark like crude oil.

DB35F3A1E70B5348AAC72A56B781EB7E.name: Blonde
DB35F3A1E70B5348AAC72A56B781EB7E.desc: Bright like a summer afternoon. You should get inside more.

CA97D685A786B142B705896D71849A56.name: Blonde
CA97D685A786B142B705896D71849A56.desc: Bright like a summer afternoon. You should get inside more.

C9D7EEF9B973FE4DA72F5C49B8670AFD.name: Brown
C9D7EEF9B973FE4DA72F5C49B8670AFD.desc: No frills, no thrills - you got better things to care about.

086C7EBA161E5342A607CB89E9BDDE25.name: Brown
086C7EBA161E5342A607CB89E9BDDE25.desc: No frills, no thrills - you got better things to care about.

4FAFB8A0C1AE834E97CBC96E756826E1.name: Red
4FAFB8A0C1AE834E97CBC96E756826E1.desc: The bright bloom of true Dwarven Rage.

E17C673F71B0D14A8B9C12FC602A193C.name: Red
E17C673F71B0D14A8B9C12FC602A193C.desc: The bright bloom of true Dwarven Rage.

4E78B5A64ED0064CAE65CE67CE0D2B28.name: Silverfox
4E78B5A64ED0064CAE65CE67CE0D2B28.desc: Minky, musky, sly, old, foxy, foxy fox.

58CC9B2C0AA6FF4EA3974A00F0FBBB0E.name: Venerable Elder
58CC9B2C0AA6FF4EA3974A00F0FBBB0E.desc: Only through great age comes great wisdom. And wisdom tells you that your knees hurt.

D3ADA6C8DDEE1E4D8827751A2835C7EC.name: Slick Investigator
D3ADA6C8DDEE1E4D8827751A2835C7EC.desc: Associated with a high-strung yet entertaining personality type.

F2387183C4F9B44987CC2F18B0A59CAB.name: Full Fro
F2387183C4F9B44987CC2F18B0A59CAB.desc: It's a statement. And that statement is "cool".

5A3E6F554B50564F853DC4E27BD5D146.name: Box Fade
5A3E6F554B50564F853DC4E27BD5D146.desc: Iconic and bold. Usually found in the company of boomboxes.

D57BAAB9409F64448940D9D9DA963284.name: Light Fro
D57BAAB9409F64448940D9D9DA963284.desc: For the cool cat on the go.

A0433017072D2B448D0C8BD6BB2B4D07.name: Massive Fro
A0433017072D2B448D0C8BD6BB2B4D07.desc: Looks cool and protects your head as well as any helmet?

9A412C8C34A1ED43B3B07C55FCD591D7.name: Beanie - Uniform
9A412C8C34A1ED43B3B07C55FCD591D7.desc: It gets cold down there sometimes. Styled to fit your armor.

CD3579D085712F49A62036ED6D2BA460.name: Beret - Uniform
CD3579D085712F49A62036ED6D2BA460.desc: A reminder of your service. Styled to fit your uniform.

C7BE1AD62886B14AA1A9DD31A56D3A48.name: The Bulldog
C7BE1AD62886B14AA1A9DD31A56D3A48.desc: Breaking class barriers for hundreds of years, this classy piece feels just as home on a ruffian as on a gentleman. Given DRG's employee politics, the latter is more rare lately.

C8C0E1567921154B80970DFC6EB66A8B.name: Cap - Uniform
C8C0E1567921154B80970DFC6EB66A8B.desc: For the professional. Matches your currently worn armor.

20F545578B422F41A6BD67EAE9289CA6.name: Classic Mining Helmet - Uniform
20F545578B422F41A6BD67EAE9289CA6.desc: Some models just don't go out of style. Styled to match your armor.

2690981E36F7984ABF4F70BD2BDA0C28.name: Classic Mining Helmet - Yellow
2690981E36F7984ABF4F70BD2BDA0C28.desc: Some models just don't go out of style.

528A9742C84B984FBBA84EC24EA9CF51.name: Heavy Duty Fixer
528A9742C84B984FBBA84EC24EA9CF51.desc: Keeps both yer noggin an' peepers safe.

2ECCECFBB9B85E4380428B87896E2D74.name: Sweep-back
2ECCECFBB9B85E4380428B87896E2D74.desc: Hardly the height of fashion, but still the sign of a powerful personality.

04B14D9AF1473D46992B6ED1CE0404BE.name: Corporate Marine
04B14D9AF1473D46992B6ED1CE0404BE.desc: Grim and infamous along the Outer Rim.

71D97C7597BB32438252140B6041B859.name: Cowpoke - White
71D97C7597BB32438252140B6041B859.desc: Reeks of class. Or money. Either or, really.

B931C67D757BC341865470FEFB31A702.name: Crest
B931C67D757BC341865470FEFB31A702.desc: What time is it? It's Slayin' Time.

281DAA771F78D641A001CE913A8C5221.name: Evil Eye
281DAA771F78D641A001CE913A8C5221.desc: Dwarves don't use sights. But, a bit of AR overlay never hurt anyone. Well, not the ones using it anyway. It's another story for those it's aimed at.

3730930601C47743828E75846193674D.name: The Franklin
3730930601C47743828E75846193674D.desc: Exudes an intangible air of Liberty and Sass.

4309A48CC3E79A4185ADCBCB31D92935.name: Gloomstalker Mask MK1
4309A48CC3E79A4185ADCBCB31D92935.desc: A highly advanced piece of kit, equipped with more tech than a small electronics store. The MK1 comes with no lower facial cover, perfect for showing off your beard.

77E53898E349B349B222CBCE6B520B36.name: Gloomstalker Mask MK2
77E53898E349B349B222CBCE6B520B36.desc: A highly advanced piece of kit, equipped with more tech than a small electronics store. The MK2 comes with a full gasmask, as handy on Hoxxes as in the locker room.

A3672B2155FEF246A89EF460520B7716.name: Gloomstalker Mask MK3
A3672B2155FEF246A89EF460520B7716.desc: A highly advanced piece of kit, equipped with more tech than a small electronics store. The MK3 comes with extended communications array, enabling you to tell off your teammates from any range.

76EA459E305AF54EBBA21D9860B9E97E.name: Goggle Cap - Uniform
76EA459E305AF54EBBA21D9860B9E97E.desc: Stylish and practical! Styled to fit your armor.

A975A4E11C8BD24BA333717FC182685F.name: Goggle Cap - Uniform
A975A4E11C8BD24BA333717FC182685F.desc: Stylish and practical! Styled to fit your armor.

DFC96B5F9B3ACD47955EB2CEE17A6884.name: Ushanka
DFC96B5F9B3ACD47955EB2CEE17A6884.desc: It can get cold down there, after all.

A43EF9AE04F83441B30E041F4265DC17.name: Greaser
A43EF9AE04F83441B30E041F4265DC17.desc: Worthy of a King under the Mountain.

B9DE436430706747B647358FD0AF1ED7.name: Great Pappy's Doughboy
B9DE436430706747B647358FD0AF1ED7.desc: Not all relics need be made of gold. This one's been in the clan for generations.

B74D2AA0A0175C4492140E719F5C410D.name: Horned Horror
B74D2AA0A0175C4492140E719F5C410D.desc: Definitely not made to look like the president of DRG.

2ADD29B79854204894FD68EAF2B0E1DE.name: AR Headset
2ADD29B79854204894FD68EAF2B0E1DE.desc: Long range communication capability and tactical heads-up display. Very cyber.

42841828DA66414DB992BE2D14F8FAEB.name: AR Headset
42841828DA66414DB992BE2D14F8FAEB.desc: Long range communication capability and tactical heads-up display. Very cyber.

13A4B455385A2740938F2B665B606F77.name: Heatwave
13A4B455385A2740938F2B665B606F77.desc: Don't let the heat get to you.

65DE56A5D82A804C8F3B485FBB68FB48.name: Iron Cyclops
65DE56A5D82A804C8F3B485FBB68FB48.desc: One big tech eye sees everything!

0CC6227F5466364F89BCAC0DD9DD02AF.name: Heavy Duty Mining Helmet
0CC6227F5466364F89BCAC0DD9DD02AF.desc: Hardened glass goggles and reinforced steel. Noone's gonna rock your noggin.

9A7AD565128B0B43973593E4799F7180.name: Heavy Duty Mining Helmet
9A7AD565128B0B43973593E4799F7180.desc: Hardened glass goggles and reinforced steel. Noone's gonna rock your noggin.

8552816B69C7BD499971EAC2634C3D4C.name: Head Honcho
8552816B69C7BD499971EAC2634C3D4C.desc: Worn by true company men, or just those with exceptional shouting and/or ordering capabilities.

6C761BE349A37C44BB97307A89C079CC.name: Techy Hard Hat
6C761BE349A37C44BB97307A89C079CC.desc: Mission Control needs his eyes and ears on the ground, after all.

E3A37A5D2715254582C6CB4566CFBBC7.name: Industrial Goggles
E3A37A5D2715254582C6CB4566CFBBC7.desc: Handy for keeping shrapnel and offal out of your baby blues.

4A4CDF2023ED554ABF5C252D14F5389B.name: Long Mane
4A4CDF2023ED554ABF5C252D14F5389B.desc: A beard for the back of your head!

017291AF3DE2464EACDCD60EDDDC4AB6.name: Messy Mane
017291AF3DE2464EACDCD60EDDDC4AB6.desc: Who needs showers anyway? Straight out of bed and straight to work!

38321FC594D8B04985B0C14B852FA819.name: Cropped Mohawk
38321FC594D8B04985B0C14B852FA819.desc: Short and brash, this shows you mean business.

FA49BA5B0B80464FA8CD48B964F72836.name: Cropped Mohawk
FA49BA5B0B80464FA8CD48B964F72836.desc: Short and brash, this shows you mean business.

9A11B02C1DE5B64083B2AC509661FD47.name: Night Vision Goggles
9A11B02C1DE5B64083B2AC509661FD47.desc: The catalogue made these look really cool. Regrettably, they don't work at all. But, they DO look cool.

0315E1CE04B1B04EB7D4084E15659FE5.name: Flight Commander
0315E1CE04B1B04EB7D4084E15659FE5.desc: But why does it make you want to sup with camels?

587E3CB7F1EBE443ACB223C09D01DA94.name: Oktoberfest Fedora
587E3CB7F1EBE443ACB223C09D01DA94.desc: The incomparable hat of legend, commemorating a holiday holding a very special place in the heart of most dwarves.

EB84DD847132DB4787AB9D380E542339.name: Party Hat - Year One
EB84DD847132DB4787AB9D380E542339.desc: Happy birthday, DRG! A special memento for every employee present during the One Year In Orbit celebrations.

2AC3F4701722B34983F6AC56AA9B833D.name: Party Hat - Year Two
2AC3F4701722B34983F6AC56AA9B833D.desc: Happy birthday, DRG! A special memento for every employee present during the Two Years In Orbit celebrations.

D581DDB7FB221C4C842FA0EE52A75B1F.name: Party Hat - Year Three
D581DDB7FB221C4C842FA0EE52A75B1F.desc: Happy birthday, DRG! A special memento for every employee present during the Three Years In Orbit celebrations.

7956915D7BC4A74B978A103663F2BE3B.name: First Blood
7956915D7BC4A74B978A103663F2BE3B.desc: It is time. Time for extreme violence.

075A49663EDEDE4BA62AA9F3C4700D0B.name: Reclamator Helmet
075A49663EDEDE4BA62AA9F3C4700D0B.desc: "Lifeless eyes, black eyes, like a doll's eyes. When he comes at ya, doesn't seem to be livin'." The Reclamator helmet is a simple design that commands instant respect.

10CD9A35512F6440A10BC1027E28015E.name: Top Knot
10CD9A35512F6440A10BC1027E28015E.desc: Usually seen in the company of tambourines.

F21C5E76C2B41F4FA3A29FB56FC541EF.name: Sixpence
F21C5E76C2B41F4FA3A29FB56FC541EF.desc: You load sixteen tons, and what do you get? A nice hat, apparently.

4F67116EE031C545B4ABF6F1C4544CF9.name: Slit Helmet
4F67116EE031C545B4ABF6F1C4544CF9.desc: Good protection, while still allowing the beard to breathe.

ED60A11AEA97DA43A210988A80D09EC9.name: Space Force
ED60A11AEA97DA43A210988A80D09EC9.desc: It is time for a new era of combat. The combat of SPACE!

339AF8C0B7AE1B4AB8B76976B9E519A0.name: Bolted Marauder
339AF8C0B7AE1B4AB8B76976B9E519A0.desc: It might be historically incorrect, but as a trope it is hard to deny the inherent coolness.

059EABDE0A2BA441A642A2F7D29D24E8.name: Award: Steamy Helmet
059EABDE0A2BA441A642A2F7D29D24E8.desc: Special Headwear for the Sept. 2019 Steam Free Weekend celebrations! Don't mind the condensation - it's good for your scalp!

757ADE2F3E80364F85D3E23B5C8172F2.name: Skeleton Crew
757ADE2F3E80364F85D3E23B5C8172F2.desc: Promoted as a breakthrough in wearable holographics, this helmet is only awarded to the most dedicated of DRG's employees. The Skeleton Crew - the Few, the Hardy, the Strong.

CC66A984B3AE164C8E11C05426B07739.name: DIver's Bell
CC66A984B3AE164C8E11C05426B07739.desc: Not exactly a combat helmet, but one can't deny that it has a certain rustic charm.

2C7A6F180DBA854C86133DB1BCEECC88.name: Full Headwrap
2C7A6F180DBA854C86133DB1BCEECC88.desc: Lets the frugal dwarf weather even the harshest sandstorm or blizzard.

12A28277E3469044999E763B7912B84F.name: Goggled Headwrap
12A28277E3469044999E763B7912B84F.desc: And you can even store a sandwich inside!

EA7180CF96448A4CAB29B49172C3FA18.name: The Ace of Spades
EA7180CF96448A4CAB29B49172C3FA18.desc: In honor of a motoring head.

BFA920D355C5054C92D3E2891CB5898A.name: The Gamekeeper
BFA920D355C5054C92D3E2891CB5898A.desc: "Ah, go boil yer heads, both of yeh."

E3262E0F64C14A4EBB0825454CF0EE80.name: Stay Frosty
E3262E0F64C14A4EBB0825454CF0EE80.desc: For all the jolly, happy souls out there.

7E5F17AD19714345952C0A1AE2B7AC2F.name: Yuletide Sock
7E5F17AD19714345952C0A1AE2B7AC2F.desc: Does this mean the wearer is a lump of coal?

E5A1E0B62DB8D44BBDDE07D6F201B537.name: Frosty Top Hat
E5A1E0B62DB8D44BBDDE07D6F201B537.desc: Something about this old top hat they found seems a bit off...

F7778610C4EE57429D0FE3E072D0C44B.name: Yuletide Cap
F7778610C4EE57429D0FE3E072D0C44B.desc: T'was the Night before Yuletide, and all through the Mine...

7D0F0AF81E5F5E4E909E6C21A3A5F6B2.name: Antler Cap
7D0F0AF81E5F5E4E909E6C21A3A5F6B2.desc: Wearing this fanciful yule cap, there is no doubt at all you'll go down in history.

EF3F4F0661FC8D46812EB33B0637897E.name: Frizzy Handlebar
EF3F4F0661FC8D46812EB33B0637897E.desc: For some reason, you have an urge to dream up maniac machines and colorful contraptions.

F4CFB7387422AD44AF1DC5B7C39000CC.name: The Optimist
F4CFB7387422AD44AF1DC5B7C39000CC.desc: Do you feel that? That manic giggle building, deep in your stomach? It must be let free-hee-hee-hee!

55CED858E63CD043A3257B21B7926F94.name: Curly Optimist
55CED858E63CD043A3257B21B7926F94.desc: For when every day is just topsy-turvy!

61A5F62545CDF445A4FA76FAFA9CEF8E.name: Spiky Neurotic
61A5F62545CDF445A4FA76FAFA9CEF8E.desc: I think that's enough coffee for one day.

F806CA3C6AAF024B9563E6B048CFEB85.name: Exquisite Handlebar
F806CA3C6AAF024B9563E6B048CFEB85.desc: Dapper! For those long, philosophical evenings of discussing the proper use of elf ears in everyday life.

7E15F5F5DD74C64093C6A71DE595ACA8.name: Lowrider
7E15F5F5DD74C64093C6A71DE595ACA8.desc: A no-nonsense moustache for a no-nonsense dwarf.

8BAA8ACAE543F942A97741EB2BC8A6C9.name: Bushy Goodguy
8BAA8ACAE543F942A97741EB2BC8A6C9.desc: Lots of huffing and puffing is required to wear this one.

4578AF1EB393ED44975A704C0CE8C924.name: Marshall
4578AF1EB393ED44975A704C0CE8C924.desc: For some reason, this one makes you yearn for wearing denim...?

2534842703D28B40A281EC995B2DFB84.name: Dandy Handlebar
2534842703D28B40A281EC995B2DFB84.desc: What ho, old sport? A good choice for the discerning dwarf.

63FBDD5A2A7C7B409CD0DD1AEB1512F0.name: Magnificent Raider
63FBDD5A2A7C7B409CD0DD1AEB1512F0.desc: Bushy and fierce - bound to strike terror into the hearts of anyone in your path!

F056382C58B5374B96E3D3D2FC353BF0.name: Bangled Braids
F056382C58B5374B96E3D3D2FC353BF0.desc: Mum left you those bangles. And by gum, you are going to wear them!

158BD2B53090F34995C10077063C1A84.name: Bound Braids
158BD2B53090F34995C10077063C1A84.desc: A timeless classic for the full-moustachioed gentleman.

7BBAB0213905C64597A2E1E2A9C52E08.name: Bismarck
7BBAB0213905C64597A2E1E2A9C52E08.desc: Dignified. Classic. The look of a refined soul.

3EF5488EA057464BBB9443E73EFE6708.name: Droopy Prospector
3EF5488EA057464BBB9443E73EFE6708.desc: A thoughtful and wise look for the discerning miner.

E3E51B9E0EBB97429D90844244EDE92A.name: Elegant Handlebar
E3E51B9E0EBB97429D90844244EDE92A.desc: Ain't no man can take from you what's yours.

4050E4232DB54C418DC94EDF2E2E0A98.name: Epic Handlebar
4050E4232DB54C418DC94EDF2E2E0A98.desc: It doesn't get much more magnificent than this.

6D0C04A85A8EEE48A35CBBC7582699BC.name: The Swanson
6D0C04A85A8EEE48A35CBBC7582699BC.desc: A classic display of subtle, raw power.

1AC5333D70B9344AB3EFC2D0D5248134.name: Collected Lawmaker
1AC5333D70B9344AB3EFC2D0D5248134.desc: Wear these and feel the respect of your peers.

D29D0DDABD047C43BE0509982DB57122.name: Trim Doubledecker
D29D0DDABD047C43BE0509982DB57122.desc: An eccentric look, to be sure. But such craftsmanship...!

172886218300EE4FB4D51CF18B78B966.name: Immense Danglies
172886218300EE4FB4D51CF18B78B966.desc: Silky soft! What conditioner do you use?

D70225ED33671745B2F6C019C0213CDE.name: Braided Bangles
D70225ED33671745B2F6C019C0213CDE.desc: An unusual set of sideburns, but with a certain air of mystique.

C4E7184FAEF28E4F8E50D11B1B968804.name: The Thickest
C4E7184FAEF28E4F8E50D11B1B968804.desc: For some dwarves, it's all about VOLUME!

AFEF616562A05E4D8FF18CB3631FF416.name: Upbeat Youngling
AFEF616562A05E4D8FF18CB3631FF416.desc: You can just SMELL the positivity!

C55610E4539A36489DEEF0A5710D5309.name: Berserker
C55610E4539A36489DEEF0A5710D5309.desc: Anger Management Courses every tuesday at 7 on Deck 12.

BBF93120B839B949A0A01D2017C209A4.name: Valiant Berserker
BBF93120B839B949A0A01D2017C209A4.desc: For when the Anger Management Course tells you that it's okay and in the Company's favor to be angry.

E02558DE6392B64A98EB9E9844DC39B7.name: Cropped Authoritarian
E02558DE6392B64A98EB9E9844DC39B7.desc: If sideburns could talk, these would tell you to stand up straight.

9F03B843586A06458EB2CA5A59CF839F.name: Cropped Authoritarian
9F03B843586A06458EB2CA5A59CF839F.desc: If sideburns could talk, these would tell you to stand up straight.

99EA902DE4B11840997113ED8F41D08E.name: Long Droopy
99EA902DE4B11840997113ED8F41D08E.desc: Basically half a beard on their own

CF83FA06F438F54DA142AD63C8573CD1.name: Beige
CF83FA06F438F54DA142AD63C8573CD1.desc: Dusty, sandy, left out in the sun for too long.

51E0CADD91ECAF48AFB95A6DCD00C760.name: Umber Brown
51E0CADD91ECAF48AFB95A6DCD00C760.desc: Deep and rich - just like the caves of Hoxxes!

A39CAE146C09034BA107940728EC29B7.name: Frozen
A39CAE146C09034BA107940728EC29B7.desc: Brrr! There's an ill wind a-blowin'.

5A35E039C22CC4469C0D3CDC358E7B9A.name: Jaundice
5A35E039C22CC4469C0D3CDC358E7B9A.desc: Perhaps it's time to lower your intake of Mactera Brew. For a while.

3FA481D2C949B54BA898E1B94D8C5F55.name: Pale
3FA481D2C949B54BA898E1B94D8C5F55.desc: Feeling a bit chilly? Or have you seen a ghost?

D3B795F10ECC9045A632B2CF209079CD.name: Pumpkin
D3B795F10ECC9045A632B2CF209079CD.desc: You really ought to see a doctor about this.

F927A6C9A7E24942A20591C62552E1D2.name: Ghoul
F927A6C9A7E24942A20591C62552E1D2.desc: The Midnight Hour is close at hand.
